articles.title: Fabinho Reveals Premier League Rival Convinced Him To Sign For Liverpool
articles.description: The new Liverpool midfielder might still be at Monaco if it wasn't for a player from one of Liverpool's Premier League rivals.

articles.title: Why was Peter Strzok fired by the FBI? Not "normal process," his lawyer says
articles.description: A suspension and demotion reportedly were recommended originally, but Strzok was dismissed instead.

articles.title: Sources: Clips drop Bowen after Kawhi remarks
articles.description: After Bruce Bowen made some critical comments about free agent target Kawhi Leonard in June, he will not be renewed as the LA Clippers television game analyst next season, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.

articles.title: Coach overturns on M25 in 'serious incident'
articles.description: There are initial reports of injuries, but the number of people onboard is not clear

articles.description: Her new book 'Unhinged' is set to hit shelves on 14 August

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: ‘They can’t stop it’: Inside the thriving business of selling fake YouTube video views
articles.description: At one point in 2013, YouTube had as much traffic from bots masquerading as people as it did from real human visitors

articles.author: Jon Brodkin
articles.title: Ajit Pai loses in court—FCC can’t kill broadband subsidy in Tribal areas
articles.description: FCC trying to kill $25 subsidy in urban areas and limit subsidy in rural areas.

articles.author: David Canellis
articles.title: John McAfee’s ‘unhackable’ cryptocurrency wallet has been hacked (again)
articles.description: Remember John McAfee’s supposedly “unhackable” cryptocurrency wallet? It appears a group of researchers is about to prove the once-lauded antivirus pioneer wrong. After cracking the so-called Bitfi wallet to play legendary game DOOM on it, today the researche…

articles.author: Justin Carissimo
articles.title: Florida man charged with manslaughter in "stand your ground" shooting
articles.description: The shooting reignited the debate over Florida's "stand your ground law" after the local sheriff's office declined to charge the shooter

articles.title: Iran's Khamenei: No war, no negotiations with Trump
articles.description: Supreme leader rejects Trump's offer as foreign minister questions whether US president is 'serious about talks'.

articles.author: MSNBC
articles.title: Omarosa: The communications staff would prep the president to lie
articles.description: In an exclusive interview with Ali Velshi and Stephanie Ruhle, Omarosa Manigauld Newman breaks down her experiences in the Trump White House and why she made her secret recordings.

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Peter Strzok, who worked on Mueller special counsel probe, fired from FBI | CBC News
articles.description: Peter Strzok, a longtime agent who once worked on special counsel Robert Mueller's Russia investigation, was fired by the FBI after he sent text messages criticizing President Donald Trump to a colleague.

articles.title: New husband, 32, gets the wrong wedding date TATTOOED on his finger
articles.description: Plasterer Wayne Lomax, 32, decided it would be romantic to get their wedding date tattooed on his ring finger in lieu of wearing a ring for fear he would lose the jewellery while at work.

articles.title: Disgruntled builder smashes down row of new-build cottages
articles.description: Romanian national Daniel Neagu, of Harrow, London, was charged with criminal damage after five retirement homes worth approximately £800,000 each were wrecked in Buntingford, Hertfordshire.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: BREAKING NEWS: Inter complete Keita deal
articles.description: Ligue 1 side Monaco have allowed Keita Balde Diao to join Inter on a one-year deal, the Serie A side having an option for a permanent move.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: BREAKING NEWS: David Silva announces retirement from international football
articles.description: After 125 games, one World Cup and two European Championships, David Silva has decided to end his Spain career.

articles.title: Marilyn Monroe's lost The Misfits nude scene is finally uncovered
articles.description: The actress filmed the scene with Clark Gable (pictured) for the 1961 feature film. The long lost footage was uncovered locked in the cabinet of Curtice Taylor, the son of the film's producer.
